name: Street Lords
description:
Near-endless cities to conquer

Generate as many cities as you care to battle for, whenever you want and however you want.
Let the generator set the city’s name or perhaps change it to your current location for a more memorable experience.
Gang territories will be allocated differently each time - play as the underdog and overthrow the big boys in charge of town, crush other weak gangs in your dominant grip, or square off against evenly matched opponents - the choice is yours.

Almost-unlimited procedurally-generated gangs

Street gangs, Mafioso bosses, tracksuit-clad, balaclava-wearing cartels - fight against a near-unlimited number of procedurally-generated gangs, customise their names and colours, and take charge of your own.

Turn-based FPS hybrid

Recruit foot soldiers, businessmen, leaders and assassins - deploy them, and control them on the urban battlefield.
Success will not just be achieved on the battlefield - strategic positioning of your faction members is key to victory.

Fight in first person

Wield a wide variety of weapons in hardcore, brutal FPS combat as you square-off against your rivals.
Carefully weighted ragdolls combined with a dynamic gore system deliver a satisfying combat experience.

A living, breathing world

Immerse yourself in a procedurally-generated news system that reports on current events in your city, including gang warfare - news is generated as you play the game, fight battles, take (and inflict) casualties!

Gory, sandbox firefights

Prefer gory, sandbox, NPC firefights? A dedicated “Shootout” mode is available where you can watch NPCs fight each other or jump into FPS combat whilst using cinematic controls to capture slow-motion gory deaths and blood spilling - there’s nothing more satisfying than turning on slow-motion whilst emptying a full magazine into your enemy!
